SQL.LOAD: SELECT ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ID, ATTRIBUTE_ID, ATTRIBUTE_VALUE, REFERENCE_ID, CREATED_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE, CREATED_BY, MODIFIED_BY FROM ELP_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE WHERE ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ID = :attribute_value_id
SQL.LOAD_AVAILABLE_ATRIBUTES_BY_TABLE_NAME_R: SELECT ATTRIBUTE_ID, TRANSLATION AS ATTRIBUTE_NAME FROM ELP_ATTRIBUTE, ELP_LABEL, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION WHERE ELP_LABEL.UI_PROG_CODE = ELP_ATTRIBUTE.UI_PROG_CODE AND ELP_LABEL.DICT_ITEM_ID = ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION.DICT_ITEM_ID AND TABLE_NAME = :table_name AND ATTRIBUTE_ID NOT IN (SELECT ATTRIBUTE_ID FROM ELP_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE WHERE REFERENCE_ID = :reference_id) AND ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id
SQL.LOAD_AVAILABLE_ATRIBUTES_BY_SERVICE_CENT: > SELECT AV.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ID, AV.ATTRIBUTE_ID, AV.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE, AV.REFERENCE_ID, DIT.TRANSLATION AS ATTRIBUTE_NAME, AV.CREATED_DATE, AV.MODIFIED_DATE, AV.CREATED_BY, AV.MODIFIED_BY FROM ELITA.ELP_ATTRIBUTE_VALUE AV, ELP_ATTRIBUTE A, ELP_LABEL L, ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DIT WHERE L.UI_PROG_CODE = A.UI_PROG_CODE AND DIT.DICT_ITEM_ID = L.DICT_ITEM_ID AND A.ATTRIBUTE_ID = AV.ATTRIBUTE_ID AND AV.REFERENCE_ID = :reference_id AND DIT.LANGUAGE_ID = :language_id
SQL.LOAD_SERVICE_CENTER_ATTRIBUTE_LIST: select a.ATTRIBUTE_ID, a.DATA_TYPE_ID, a.CREATED_DATE, a.MODIFIED_DATE, a.CREATED_BY, a.MODIFIED_BY, a.UI_PROG_CODE, a.UI_PROG_CODE AS ATTRIBUTE_NAME, --DIT.TRANSLATION AS ATTRIBUTE_NAME, a.TABLE_NAME, av.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE_ID, av.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE, av.ATTRIBUTE_ID, av.ATTRIBUTE_VALUE as DESCRIPTION, av.REFERENCE_ID from elp_attribute a join elp_attribute_value av on a.attribute_id = av.attribute_id--, --ELP_LABEL L, --ELP_DICT_ITEM_TRANSLATION DIT WHERE --L.UI_PROG_CODE = A.UI_PROG_CODE AND -- DIT.DICT_ITEM_ID = L.DICT_ITEM_ID AND --A.ATTRIBUTE_ID = AV.ATTRIBUTE_ID AND AV.REFERENCE_ID = :REFERENCE_ID --AND --DIT.LANGUAGE_ID = :LANGUAGE_ID
